attributes.action: A vote of no confidence in the UK government and our political system
attributes.additional_details: Walk away from your responsibilities as you have failed
attributes.background:
Change our political structure
Capitalism will destroy the human race

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We can't accept petitions votes of no confidence in the Government, and it's not clear what you mean by a vote of no confidence in the "political system".

If you would like to see particular constitutional changes you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
